body:
Files: src/wasm/wasm-objects.{h,cc}
Key classes and fields affecting wrappers:
- WasmExportedFunction (JSFunction subclass): static New(...) builds JS-exported wrapper; uses WasmExportedFunctionData; picks export wrapper code (JS_TO_WASM_FUNCTION or builtins JSToWasm/WasmPromising/WasmStressSwitch) and sets arity. GetDebugName("js-to-wasm:<sig>"). IsWasmExportedFunction checks CodeKind/builtin id.
- WasmJSFunction (JSFunction subclass): New(sig, callable, suspend) builds wasm.js function representing JS import; creates WasmJSFunctionData; installs either compiled wrapper from cache (MaybeGet), generic torque builtin, or compiles wrapper through cache; internal.call_target gets CPT entry. Exposes GetCallable(), GetSignature, GetSuspend.
- WasmFunctionData, WasmExportedFunctionData, WasmJSFunctionData: carry sig, sig_index, internal WasmInternalFunction, wrapper code pointer, instance_data link. WasmJSFunctionData::OffheapData owns wrapper CPT entry and refcount.
- WasmInternalFunction: protected implicit_arg (TrustedObject: WasmTrustedInstanceData or WasmImportData), call_target (WasmCodePointer), external JSFunction cache; GetOrCreateExternal() builds WasmExportedFunction for exports and selects appropriate export wrapper code (generic or compiled).
- WasmImportData: holds instance_data, call_origin (TrustedObject), suspend, table_slot; used as implicit_arg for wasm-to-js wrappers; SetIndexInTableAsCallOrigin and SetFuncRefAsCallOrigin assist wrapper tier-up.
- WasmDispatchTable/WasmDispatchTableData: holds indirect call targets: implicit_arg, target (WasmCodePointer or function_index in jitless), sig id; installs wrappers via SetForWrapper (manages CodePointerTable entry and refcount) or SetForNonWrapper; tracks wrappers in off-heap data with Add/Remove and IsAWrapper; AddUse/MaybeGrowUsesList manage uses.
- ImportedFunctionEntry: initializes import entries: SetGenericWasmToJs uses generic builtin WasmToJsWrapperAsm or invalid-sig; SetCompiledWasmToJs installs compiled wrapper code; SetWasmToWasm for direct calls.
- FunctionTargetAndImplicitArg: for JS->Wasm calls resolving call target and implicit arg from WasmInternalFunction or target instance.
Additional relevant glue:
- UseGenericWasmToJSWrapper(kind, sig, suspend) gating generic torque builtin path by platform and v8_flags.wasm_generic_wrapper and suspend==NoSuspend.
- Tables: WasmTableObject::UpdateDispatchTable integrates with wrapper cache and dispatch table installation; UpdateDispatchTable for JS and C-API uses cache.MaybeGet/Compile and installs CPT entry and signature hash.
- JITless/JSPI: conditional branches to interpreter wrappers and stack switching.
explanation: This entry maps the object model that connects wrappers with JavaScript-visible functions and dispatch tables. It shows how export and import wrapper code is selected, installed, and referenced at runtime, including CPT management and tier-up plumbing.
file_line: wasm/wasm-objects.h: multiple classes; wasm/wasm-objects.cc: implementations (see ~ lines 1900-3600 for dispatch table, wrapper installs, exported/JSFunction creation).
